FRISteam.Strategies.TextRank.textrank.textrank_keywords(abstract, langTag)¶

function textrank_keywords : main function to automatically extract keywords from an abstract with TextRank and normalizes them between 0 and 1

Args:

abstract (string): an abstract (or paper) as a string langTag (string): the language of the words in wordList and the synonyms (e.g. ‘eng’ for English and ‘nld’ for Dutch)

Returns:

list: {dictionary of terms with their frequency relative to the total amount of words}
